name: Alteira (PierreGrl)
description:
A 1V1 offline game based on duality.

The two players will play in turn a pursuer and a pursued in a dynamic gameplay full of twists and turns.

They evolve in a labyrinth that includes objects to spice up the game.

The 2 players have 3 lives, they will take turns to play the characters Yin and Yang.

The objective of Yang (white character) is to catch Yin (black character).

The objective of the latter is to catch the central YinYang to reverse the roles of the two players.
